title: Farm Tractor Tire Repair at Home

subtasks: Jack up the tractor to access the flat tire.
Identify and remove the retaining pin from the tire.
Remove the tire from the rim for patching.
Clean debris and damage from the rim and tire.
Patch the tire using Gorilla Tape Weather Patch.
Install the patched tire back onto the rim.
Inflate the tire and check for proper fitment.
Lower the tractor and verify the tire's function.

tasks.task: Prepare a trailer for September deadline.
subtasks: Assess and plan the removal of the trailer obstructing the tractor.
Identify and outline necessary repairs for the bumper hitch.
